title: Video: Don't underestimate the power of community in your games
text:
Video: Don't underestimate the power of community in your games 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
At GDC 2014 Kongregate's Emily Greer underscores the critical role games play in creating communities of players by sharing facts and anecdo...
